summary:
## US Open Tennis Championships

The US Open is a major tennis tournament held every year in New York City. It's the last of the four biggest tennis events, or "Grand Slams." The tournament started in 1881 and is played on hard courts. It begins in late August and lasts two weeks.

Players must be at least 14 years old. Events include men's and women's singles and doubles, mixed doubles, and competitions for juniors and wheelchair players. The US Open is known for its exciting matches and unique traditions, like the honey deuce cocktail.
title: US Open (tennis)
